text: Hárold Santiago Mosquera Caicedo (born 7 February 1995) Santi Mosquera is a Colombian footballer who currently plays as a winger for FC Dallas in Major League Soccer. ==Career== Santi Mosquera began his career with two seasons for Colombian first division side Millonarios. In February 2018, Mosquera signed with FC Dallas of Major League Soccer.https://www.fcdallas.com/post/2018/02/12/fc-dallas-signs-santiago- mosquera-young-designated-player == Club statistics == * Apps (A), Goals (G), Assistance (A..) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! rowspan="2" width="130px" |Club ! rowspan="2" width="30px" | Div. ! rowspan="2" width="50px" | Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="3"|Cup !colspan="3"|Continental !colspan="3"|Total !rowspan="2"|Prom. |- !
